text: 今天也要元气满满，代码创造无限可能！💪
author: 程序员格言

text: 代码改变世界，每一行都是对未来的投资 🌍
保持好奇，持续学习，技术的海洋永无止境 📚
早起的鸟儿有虫吃，勤奋的程序员有bug修 🐦
author: 开发者智慧

text: Bug不是问题，是通往完美代码的垫脚石 🌟
优秀的代码不是写出来的，是重构出来的
author: Martin Fowler

text: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
author: Linus Torvalds

text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now. 🌱
author: Chinese Proverb

text: 简单是最高级的复杂性
author: Leonardo da Vinci

text: 任何傻瓜都能写出计算机可以理解的代码。好程序员能写出人能理解的代码。
author: Martin Fowler

text: Programming is not about typing, it's about thinking. 🧠
代码如诗，每一个函数都是一首优美的诗篇 ✨
Stay hungry, stay foolish, stay coding! 🚀
author: Tech Philosophy

text: 人生苦短，我用Python；效率至上，我选JavaScript ⚡
Every expert was once a beginner. Every pro was once an amateur. 🌟
Coffee + Code = Magic ☕✨
author: Developer's Equation

text: 不要害怕改变，拥抱新技术，拥抱未来 🔮
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

text: 编程是一门艺术，而程序员是艺术家 🎨
First, solve the problem. Then, write the code. 💡
author: John Johnson
